Instructions

Be aware that the CSS for this template is completely external. This means that when you edit the CSS, that element will change on every page. There will be no use of internal CSS on the WMHS Website any further. If you need to modify an element on only one page, do so on the modifiers.css stylesheet included within the template.

!IMPORTANT

The website guidelines have been reworked. Please review them before working. If you have any questions, feel free to ask Web Design leadership (Webmasters, editors, etc) and they will steer you in the right direction. This text may be deleted whenever you like.

Also, the CSS as well as HTML code have comments within them, so please read those before editing.

- Webmasters
